funFacts.label: Main Character Quarter
funFacts.detail: You came out of the gates sprinting—more than half your year’s PRs landed in Q1, setting the pace for everything that followed.

funFacts.label: The Mega-PR Moment
funFacts.detail: “Capsule async support” rewired Media Analyzer at scale—217 files touched and a whole new async path unlocked.

funFacts.label: Async Everywhere
funFacts.detail: From Capsule async support to “Get async responses on S3” (+1,854/-188), 2025 was the year you made async feel inevitable.

funFacts.label: Rapid-Fire Reviewer
funFacts.detail: You were the go-to teammate—approvals, comments, and unblock energy across the busiest threads.

funFacts.label: The Revert-to-Ship Combo
funFacts.detail: When charts got spicy, you didn’t flinch—revert, reapply, and land the right version (the true DevOps waltz).

bigRocks.title: Async Awakening (Capsule Edition)
bigRocks.impact: Introduced true async analysis for AI Vision + Captioning by switching to Capsule AsyncSend and building the plumbing to route results back safely.

bigRocks.title: Crash Reporter: ArgoCD Context Upgrade
bigRocks.impact: Taught Captain Crash to pull deployment intelligence from ArgoCD, making incident reports instantly more actionable.

bigRocks.title: Internal Fast Lane: Billing Bypass
bigRocks.impact: Enabled internal services to bypass billing via header-based logic—speeding internal workflows without burning quota.

bigRocks.title: Prompt Engineering Launchpad
bigRocks.impact: Shipped the AI Vision Tag Generation prompt engineering service and the underlying model, turning prompts into a first-class feature.

bigRocks.title: Captain GPT Takes the Helm
bigRocks.impact: Brought GPT-powered summarization into the crash pipeline, including initializers and data stitching for clearer, faster triage.

quarterlyActivity.highlights: Captain Crash came to life: Slack command integration, GPT foundations, Rollbar/Coralogix wiring, and a flurry of reliability fixes.
Sharper incident signal: alert filtering, prompt tuning, and deployment context improvements—less noise, more truth.
Platform polish and permissions: S3 access work, validations, and targeted fixes that kept the pipeline steady.
Async endgame: big Capsule async landing, S3 async responses, and the final run of stability + chart iterations to ship clean.

topRepos.name: media_analyzer
topRepos.funFact: Home of the year’s biggest swing: “Capsule async support” touched 217 files and changed how analysis works at scale.

topRepos.name: captain-crash-lambda
topRepos.funFact: From basic structure to a GPT-assisted incident companion—Slack, Rollbar, Coralogix, and ArgoCD context all leveled up.

yearInReview.headline: The Year of Async & Incident Clarity
yearInReview.tagline: 117 PRs merged, 123874 lines added, and two repos transformed: Media Analyzer went truly async while Captain Crash got smarter, louder, and more actionable.
